title: From Priyanka-Nick To Kareena-Saif, Bollywood Stars Get In Festive Mood To Celebrate Diwali
text:
The festival of lights is here yet again, and everyone is highly enthusiastic to celebrate the occasion. Be it dance parties or card parties or just families bonding together, the festivities begin days in advance. And Bollywood, just like every year, takes the celebrations a notch higher!

Diwali celebrations in Bollywood are going on from the past week. Several stars hosted Diwali bash at their residence. But the Khan, Kareena and Saif, kept it as their family affair. Here’s how the Pataudi family celebrated the festival of lights.

Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra, who not long ago gave us a glimpse into their first ever Karwa Chauth, is celebrating their first ever Diwali this year.

Instagram

Giving out the festive vibes, Nickyanka, as they are fondly called, welcomed Lord Ganesha-Lakshmi as they are celebrating their first Diwali in Cabo, Mexico.

Instagram

Ekta Kapoor had also thrown a Diwali bash at her residence in Mumbai, and not only Bollywood stars but many Television stars also graced the occasion. From Kapil Sharma to Shahid-Mira and Kartik Aaryan, here’s how stars dressed up in their ethnic best outfits.
